com.algebraweb.editor.client.graphcanvas
Interface Fillable

All Known Subinterfaces:
AlgebraEditorCanvasView
All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphCanvas, LogicalCanvas
public interface Fillable

Fillable object can be filled with nodes.

Author:
Patrick Brosi

addNode

GraphNode addNode(int nid,
                  int color,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  int fixedChildCount)
Add a new node.

Parameters:
nid - the node's id
color - the node's color as a hex integer
x - the node's x position
y - the node's y position
width - the node's width
height - the node's height
text - the node's caption
fixedChildCount - the number of childs the node can be a parent of
Returns:
a loaded GraphNode
